      public void cancelBooking(Flight flight) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Removes the specified booking from the customer's list of bookings
      Parameters:
      flight - as Flight
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if the customerï¿½s list of bookings doesnï¿½t contain a booking for the flight that is given as a parameter
